fullplot: Antonio Albajara is a successful poet and teacher in the Berkeley University that returns to Gijèn (Principality of Asturias, north to Spain). He travels there looking for everything that he left behind in his youth when he turned a well-known poet and writer in Mexico and USA, winning the Nobel prize with time. In Gijèn he meets again with his past in Roxiu, an old friend (both played in the Sporting of Gijèn's soccer team years ago) and Elena, his great-love of past times. Through his memory, his friends and Elena, Antonio starts an unforgettable journey by everyone.
plot: A Nobel prize winner returns to his natal city looking for his home.
title: Volver a empezar
